title: Testing "create a discussion" in hopes to update lvl 4 account to lvl 30; which is more accurate.

replies.body: It did. Cool. yay. now i should be able to comment on things i want to comment on now that i'm above lvl 6.

Sometimes it takes a bit for those levels to sync up. Looks like post here did the trick!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Yep! thanks for info, haha have a good one.
